JwtDecoder()[1/3] JwtDecoderJWT.JwtDecoder JWT.JwtDecoderJwtDecoder
JWT.JwtDecoder.JwtDecoder (IJsonSerializer jsonSerializer, IBase64UrlEncoder urlEncoder)
Creates an instance of JwtDecoder
This overload supplies no IJwtValidator and no IAlgorithmFactory so the resulting decoder cannot be used for signature validation.
Parameters

The JSON serializer
urlEncoder
The base64 URL encoder
Exceptions
